channel.title: Prologue on Loon
channel.description: Recent content in Prologue on Loon

item.title: History
item.description: alright, so who's to blame for making you study this bloody subject? You know it, isuck newton, They say Isaac Newton died a virgin. That means you, my dear reader, have something over one of the greatest geniuses of all time. You're still alive. Calculus so anyway the story goes, a plague (think covid-19) hits Cambridge in 1666 and Newton self quarantines, and in that time, develops the foundations of Calculus.

item.title: Prerequisites
item.description: okay, you're here cuz u wanna know what the fuck u gotta know before reading this mastershitpiece Vectors (and some matrices) I mean, its just a bunch of fuckin numbers collected together, $$\Large \color{pink} \vecD{2}{3}$$see? Some familiarity with matrices will be needed, but really I recommend you understand what a matrix is doing behind the hood (cough cough linear transformations) In any case, check out at the very least, it's an enjoyable watch
